Package org.arl.fjage.shell

Interface Shell

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConsoleShell, DumbShell
public interface Shell
Any shell input/output driver should implement this interface.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    ABORT
    Abort string returned when user presses ^C.

  • Field Details

    • ABORT

      static final String ABORT
      Abort string returned when user presses ^C.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • init

      void init(ScriptEngine engine)
      Initialize the shell.
      Parameters:
      engine - script engine to use for sentence completion check, or null to disable.

    • prompt

      void prompt(Object obj)
      Prompt user for input.

    • input

      void input(Object obj)
      Display input line.

    • println

      void println(Object obj)
      Display script output.

    • notify

      void notify(Object obj)
      Display unsolicited notification.

    • error

      void error(Object obj)
      Display error.

    • readLine

      String readLine(String prompt1, String prompt2, String line)
      Read a line from the shell.
      Parameters:
      prompt1 - prompt to display on first line, null if none.
      prompt2 - prompt to display on continuation line, null if none.
      line - input text to edit, null if blank.
      Returns:
      input string, null on EOF, or ABORT on ^C.

    • isDumb

      boolean isDumb()
      Check if terminal supports ANSI control sequences.
      Returns:
      true if it does not support control sequences, false if it supports.

    • shutdown

      void shutdown()
      Shutdown the shell.
